note:
Degree in Political Science, career in tech.
Inhabitant of YEG for most of 55 years and the neighbourhood of Westmount for over 20. Had a new house built during the pandemic on the site of our old one. Partner to the amazing @daintychainsaw.
30+ years in virtual communities from late 80’s BBS’s to current social media with stops in Usenet, MMO groups, Discord…

Gamer of all types from boardgames to computer games to console games.

Edmonton, Alberta

fields.name: Quote
fields.value:
“Evil begins when you begin to treat people as things.” ― Terry Pratchett

"Nae king! Nae quin! Nae laird! Nae master! We willna' be fooled again!" - Nac Mac Feegle
